description: Jodi Taylor is bound in handcuffs and given a crotch rope of unforgiving steel attached to a heavy metal ball and paraded down a public street. Sticky pads with remote controlled electricity are added to the backs of her thighs causing her to yelp and squirm uncontrollably while the public watches. Like a dog she drinks from a water bowl and has what she cannot finish thrown in her face. She is then taken into a bar where she is ass fucked, slapped, spit on and humiliated before being chained in the bathroom and left to be used by strangers.
title: Girl Next Store Shocked and Bound in Public, Ass Fucked, Humiliated
